content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":214272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「犯人は……貴方ですよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The culprit... is you, right?\""},{"lineNumber":214273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「警備員バイタルさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Security guard Vital-san\""},{"lineNumber":214274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":214275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、この人！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, this person!?\""},{"lineNumber":214276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イージスさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aegis-san\""},{"lineNumber":214277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm."},{"lineNumber":214278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すまんが、失礼する」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, but I'll excuse myself.\""},{"lineNumber":214279,"originalJapaneseLine":"イージスがバイタルの身体検査を行う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Aegis conducted a physical search of Vital."},{"lineNumber":214280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":214281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……見つかったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Found it."},{"lineNumber":214282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　紹介状と指輪だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"An introduction letter and a ring.\""},{"lineNumber":214283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、良かったわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's a relief...\""},{"lineNumber":214284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってことは、やっぱり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that means, after all!\""},{"lineNumber":214285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":214286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が犯人です」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the culprit.\""},{"lineNumber":214287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「み、皆さん！　申し訳ありません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-everyone! I'm sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":214288,"originalJapaneseLine":"バイタルはその場で","translatedEnglishLine":"Vital, right there,"},{"lineNumber":214289,"originalJapaneseLine":"床に額を擦りつけて土下座した。","translatedEnglishLine":"pressed his forehead to the floor and performed a dogeza (apology prostration)."},{"lineNumber":214290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……この馬鹿者が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You fool!\""},{"lineNumber":214291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「答えろバイタル！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Answer me, Vital!"},{"lineNumber":214292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしてこのようなことをした！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why did you do such a thing!\""},{"lineNumber":214293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":214294,"originalJapaneseLine":"バイタルは訥々と語り出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Vital began to speak hesitantly."},{"lineNumber":214295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、私は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I...\""},{"lineNumber":214296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　年老いた母と二人で暮らしています」","translatedEnglishLine":"live together with my elderly mother.\""},{"lineNumber":214297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貧しいながらも平和な生活……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was a poor but peaceful life..."},{"lineNumber":214298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だったのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...but it was so...\""},{"lineNumber":214299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最近そのお母様がご病気に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Recently, that mother has fallen ill..."},{"lineNumber":214300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうよね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":214301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":214302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、その通りです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's exactly right...\""},{"lineNumber":214303,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手術が必要なのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She needs surgery,"},{"lineNumber":214304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その金額が膨大で自分ではとても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the cost is enormous, I simply can't afford it...\""},{"lineNumber":214305,"originalJapaneseLine":"「母の病状は悪くなる一方……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My mother's condition is only getting worse..."},{"lineNumber":214306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですがお金はない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I have no money...\""},{"lineNumber":214307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は参っておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was at my wit's end.\""},{"lineNumber":214308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなとき、昨日の騒ぎが発生し、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At such a time, the commotion yesterday happened,"},{"lineNumber":214309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お客様の避難誘導をしている時、","translatedEnglishLine":"and while I was guiding the customers to evacuate,"},{"lineNumber":214310,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふと気づいてしまったのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"I suddenly realized something.\""},{"lineNumber":214311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、ここで盗みを働けば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I were to steal now, right here,"},{"lineNumber":214312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　母が助かるかも知れない、と……」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe my mother could be saved...\""},{"lineNumber":214313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔が差しちゃったって奴だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You could say I was tempted by darkness.\""},{"lineNumber":214314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……今でも思い出すと、恐ろしくなります」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Even now, when I remember it, it terrifies surprised..."},{"lineNumber":214316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気づけば私の窃盗が宿屋中で","translatedEnglishLine":"Before I knew it, my theft was said to have occurred all over the inn,"},{"lineNumber":214317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行われたことになっていて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"or so it was claimed...\""},{"lineNumber":214318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでロッキー様が捕まるようなことになり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And because of that, Lord Rocky was caught...\""},{"lineNumber":214319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、うん……うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes... yes...\""},{"lineNumber":214320,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かローブの少女は気まずそうに","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, the robed girl looked uneasy"},{"lineNumber":214321,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔を逸らしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and averted her face."},{"lineNumber":214322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっといいかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-can I say something?\""},{"lineNumber":214323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バイタルさんが行ったお医者さんね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The doctor that Vital-san visited,"},{"lineNumber":214324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、言いにくいけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it's hard to say, but..."},{"lineNumber":214325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪徳医師として有名な人なの」","translatedEnglishLine":"he's known as a corrupt doctor.\""},{"lineNumber":214326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":214327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんた、なんでそんなこと知ってるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How do you know something like that?\""},{"lineNumber":214328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、分かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I get it."},{"lineNumber":214329,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別行動って言って、その辺調べてたんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You said you went your separate ways and were investigating around there.\""},{"lineNumber":214330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そうなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":214331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最初にバイタルさんの評判を調べたら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, when I checked Vital-san's reputation...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イージスがバイタルの身体検査を行う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aegis conducted a physical search of Vital.
An introduction letter and a ring."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「み、皆さん！　申し訳ありません！」
床に額を擦りつけて土下座した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pressed his forehead to the floor and performed a dogeza (apology prostration).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてこのようなことをした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did you do such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイタルは訥々と語り出す。
年老いた母と二人で暮らしています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: live together with my elderly mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧しいながらも平和な生活……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was a poor but peaceful life...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最近そのお母様がご病気に……
その金額が膨大で自分ではとても……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the cost is enormous, I simply can't afford it..."
"My mother's condition is only getting worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなとき、昨日の騒ぎが発生し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At such a time, the commotion yesterday happened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お客様の避難誘導をしている時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and while I was guiding the customers to evacuate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと気づいてしまったのです」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I were to steal now, right here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母が助かるかも知れない、と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe my mother could be saved..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔が差しちゃったって奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You could say I was tempted by darkness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今でも思い出すと、恐ろしくなります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Even now, when I remember it, it terrifies me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次の日になると驚きました……
気づけば私の窃盗が宿屋中で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, my theft was said to have occurred all over the inn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行われたことになっていて……」
「それでロッキー様が捕まるようなことになり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And because of that, Lord Rocky was caught..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かローブの少女は気まずそうに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, the robed girl looked uneasy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バイタルさんが行ったお医者さんね、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it's hard to say, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪徳医師として有名な人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's known as a corrupt doctor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた、なんでそんなこと知ってるの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How do you know something like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別行動って言って、その辺調べてたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said you went your separate ways and were investigating around there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初にバイタルさんの評判を調べたら……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イージスがバイタルの身体検査を行う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aegis conducted a physical search of Vital.
An introduction letter and a ring."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「み、皆さん！　申し訳ありません！」
床に額を擦りつけて土下座した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pressed his forehead to the floor and performed a dogeza (apology prostration).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてこのようなことをした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did you do such a thing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バイタルは訥々と語り出す。
年老いた母と二人で暮らしています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: live together with my elderly mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貧しいながらも平和な生活……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was a poor but peaceful life...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最近そのお母様がご病気に……
その金額が膨大で自分ではとても……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the cost is enormous, I simply can't afford it..."
"My mother's condition is only getting worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなとき、昨日の騒ぎが発生し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At such a time, the commotion yesterday happened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お客様の避難誘導をしている時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and while I was guiding the customers to evacuate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと気づいてしまったのです」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I were to steal now, right here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母が助かるかも知れない、と……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe my mother could be saved..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔が差しちゃったって奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You could say I was tempted by darkness."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……今でも思い出すと、恐ろしくなります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Even now, when I remember it, it terrifies me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「次の日になると驚きました……
気づけば私の窃盗が宿屋中で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before I knew it, my theft was said to have occurred all over the inn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行われたことになっていて……」
「それでロッキー様が捕まるようなことになり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And because of that, Lord Rocky was caught..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かローブの少女は気まずそうに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, the robed girl looked uneasy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バイタルさんが行ったお医者さんね、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it's hard to say, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪徳医師として有名な人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's known as a corrupt doctor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた、なんでそんなこと知ってるの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How do you know something like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別行動って言って、その辺調べてたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said you went your separate ways and were investigating around there."
